Name: Raven Bow
Title: Bane of Flame and Water: Raven Bow
Desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. As such, hunters would decorate their bows' limbs with feathers which forebode the imminent death of their targets.

Talent.Name: Raven Bow
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3202}Bow Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
